title: Public transport for the A League Round 7: Melbourne Victory v Perth Glory
articleContent:
We're running extra services to get you to and from the Melbourne Victory v Perth Glory match at AAMI Park on Sunday 8 December.

The event starts at 5pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner. Check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Return trains from Richmond Station

  • Ringwood leaving 7:16pm from Platform 9

  • Glen Waverley leaving at 7:22pm from Platform 9

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from AAMI Park

Route 70 trams run from Flinders Street / Elizabeth Street (Stop 4) and Stop 7C MCG/John Cain Arena.

 Metropolitan bus

Getting to and from the Showgrounds  

The following bus route travels close to the MCG: 

  • Route 246 (Elsternwick - Clifton Hill via St Kilda)

The last bus may run before the end of the match.

 Regional train

Normal trains run to and from Southern Cross Station. Connect with metropolitan trains from North Melbourne and Southern Cross stations or trams from Flinders Street/Elizabeth Street.
